function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of personal protection measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce the use of personal protection measures","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), education and awareness campaigns","People":"Community members, individuals at risk of disease transmission","Owner":"Health departments, local authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate community-level vector control","Impact":"Higher risk of vector-borne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement effective larvicides and adulticides, increase community-level vector control efforts","Technologies":"Vector control technologies, surveillance and monitoring systems","People":"Community members, individuals at risk of vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Health departments, local authorities"},{"Description":"Sensitivity to parameters with semi-arbitrary values","Impact":"Unpredictable model outcomes and data interpretation","Mitigation":"Use data-backed parameter values, conduct sensitivity analysis, and validate model outcomes","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, sensitivity analysis software","People":"Data analysts, researchers, modelers","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysis teams"}]}
